title: NLL Regressions in 1.40

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-beta
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to beta.

labels.name: T-release
labels.description: Relevant to the release subteam, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
* [thrussh](https://crates.io/crates/thrussh): point release needed with a fix: 0.19.6; [broken](https://crater-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.40-1/beta-2019-11-06/reg/async-ssh-0.1.2/log.txt)
* [vek](https://crates.io/crates/vek): verify that more recent versions build, 0.9.4 is [broken](https://crater-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.40-1/beta-2019-11-06/gh/LEARAX.red_rim/log.txt)
* [florima/agents](https://github.com/floriama/agents): fix master, [broken](https://crater-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.40-1/beta-2019-11-06/gh/floriama.agents/log.txt)
* https://github.com/johshoff/find-tempo-rust-backend: https://crater-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.40-1/beta-2019-11-06/gh/johshoff.find-tempo-rust-backend/log.txt
* https://github.com/mfontanini/rpki-validator: https://crater-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.40-1/beta-2019-11-06/gh/mfontanini.rpki-validator/log.txt
* https://github.com/fernandobatels/blitz-money: https://crater-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.40-1/beta-2019-11-06/gh/fernandobatels.blitz-money/log.txt
